summary: Free bed in Riverwood for your use.
descriptionHtml:
Free bed in Riverwood.
*****Note******
Don\'t use this mod BEFORE finish the main quest(Dragon quest), I haven\'t tested it(as I already finished the main quest) but, it should work as it doesn\'t alter scripts.
I made this mod, because I ran away from Solitude after escaping the Prison, so I escaped to the Riverwood\'s in, and well I needed a bed, so I made this.
author: xJohnxConnerx
